title: AI Minecraft Bot
shortDescription: A Minecraft bot that connects to a backend Python server to perform complex tasks using AI.
description: The main bot script is written in JavaScript using mineflayer library, which communicates with the Python backend in order to perform complex tasks. Low ping using raw sockets and self-trained efficient models. Supports features such as following players, making it's own decisions and having a web UI interface for easier control.
reason: Wouldn't it be great to have an automated friend with you in Minecraft? Specially when you need some boring tasks completed. That's what I wanted; which required me to first build my AI from scratch for performance, ease-of-use, and accomplish something I want.
